text: Consider the following relation R on A = {1, 2, 3}: R={1, 1), (2, 2), (3, 3)} Then which of the following statement is/are true? (a) R is an equivalence relation. (b) R is a partial order relation. (c) R is a total order relation. (d) R is a partial order relation and the Hasse-diagram of R has three edges.
